m_descr: This module acts as HTTP interface for Person Counter Devices.
l_room_id_one: Enter the number of the room to be monitored
l_room_id_two: Enter the number of the neighboring room, which should be monitored
l_room_help: You can find the room id in the Settings Rooms Edit the specific room last character in the URL
l_room_access_control_help: Choose a type of room access control
l_motion_sensor_two: Motion sensor in the neighboring room
l_ultrasonic_sensor: Ultrasonic sensor on the upper door frame
l_ultrasonic_sensor_door_height_help: Please enter the height of the door in centimeter (cm)
